pages.text:
Paddleboard Lessons
Jacksonville Surf and Paddle Stand Up Paddleboarding (SUP) instructors are at your service 365 days a year!  We specialize in SUP flatwater, surf, long distance, fitness race training, and travel.  Most people are curious about paddleboarding and just need a little help getting started. Come try paddleboarding with us. There are many beautiful places to paddle in North Florida that are true eco destinations.  Let us show you the  other side of Jacksonville and St Augustine.
Private Paddleboard Lessons
- Here you will find high quality stand up paddleboard instruction.  We have certified instructors who can get you paddling in one lesson guaranteed or your money back.  One on one or private group instruction to fit any level and help you progress.
Public Paddleboard Class
- Weekly public classes available for beginners and intermediate level paddlers. There is a program for all skill levels.  Check our
Class Calendar
for available classes.
Paddleboard Eco Tour
- We have a monthly local tour schedule for intermediate paddlers and also offer private tours from North Jacksonville to St Augustine.
Paddleboard Parties for Adults & Kids
- SUP parties for your adult special event like bachelorette, bachelor or wedding parties.  Also, a kids SUP party is an option for small surf and flat water paddling.
Paddleboard Corporate Events
- Team build with your business on the water!  Walk on water with your work associates. There are many way to schedule a team building event, try JSP Team Building services.  You will be remembered!
Paddleboard Rental
-
Rent paddleboards by the hour, 4 hours, day, or week. Visit our rental page to view our boards and book live online 24/7.

About Us
Jacksonville Surf and Paddle (JSP) has a program for anyone who wants to ride a board whether it's just for fun or as part of a workout program.  We consider surfing to be any type of wave riding or board riding. Our programs encompass all the different styles of surfing and stand up paddleboarding; flatwater paddling, eco tours, sup racing, sup surfing, surfing, and adventure trips.  Surfing and SUP is great for your health.  It promotes strength in body and mind.  Our company was created to add value to people learning how to surf.  It can be a lifelong learning process.
JSP team members are insured and certified through the American Canoe Association (ACA), International Surfing Association (ISA), World Paddle Association (WPA),  & PaddleFit.  We are also Red Cross CPR and First Aid Certified.
Jacksonville Surf and Paddle has been put together to inspire you to continue surfing and SUPing forever!
Our qualified instructors are available for hire all year round. We offer surf and stand up paddleboarding workshops, camps and retreats. There are different tours to choose from including top local and international destinations. Jacksonville Surf and Paddle's professional instructors are trained and certified with over 65 years of combined experience, our clients receive first hand knowledge and excellent service.  Learn more about us by exploring the links below.
